validation.validation: Student Notes Topics need to be active.
Specify Student Notes Topics that belong to the same category.
The student and the web service processing user can't have the same account in Workday.
Specify the financial aid award year in the Financial Aid Award Year field. You can’t specify the Financial Aid Award Year in the Relates To Reference field.
Specify the academic period in the Academic Period field. You can’t specify the Academic Period in the Relates to Reference field.
Specify a unique value for the Relates to Types: [types]
Specify a valid Relates To Type for the Category. The Category is not associated to the specified Relates To Types: [invalid types]
Specify a role that is either Employee, Contingent Worker, or Admissions Counselor.
Specify today's date as the note creation date and time.
Ensure that the student and the note creator have unique accounts in Workday.
The specified student has been merged with another student record. Specify the merged student instead.
Specify a Note Creator who has access to the Note Topics.
Specify a Note Creator who has access to the Student.
Specify the [Object] for the selected student. You can't specify a [Object] associated with another student.
Set Delete to false if you're adding a new note.
You can't edit an existing note.
You can't add the Last Editor or Last Edited Moment.
